content:
All of the links on http://hl7.org/fhir/us/carin-bb/2020Feb/CARIN_Blue_Button_Framework_Specification.html (and the CI build)
are broken.

Not sure how close to "ready" this new 0.1.6 version is...should we report broken links if we find them? The one I just hit is at https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/carin-bb/CapabilityStatement-c4bb.html#behavior General Security Considerations
Broken links show up in the QA report that I check periodically to see that I didn't mess things up...but if you see 'em, flagging 'em expedites fixing 'em.
